original_text: Hilkiah said to Shaphan the secretary, “I have found the Book of the Law in the temple of the Lord.” He gave it to Shaphan.
korean_text: 힐기야가 서기관 사반에게 말하여 이르되 내가 여호와의 전에서 율법책을 발견하였노라 하고 힐기야가 그 책을 사반에게 주매

sentences.original_text: Hilkiah said to Shaphan the secretary
I have found the Book of the Law
in the temple of the Lord
